article.title: Canada SWAT team molest the Queen
article.teaser: Several police vehicles surrounded Pawlowski after he finished a service on Saturday, ordered him out of his car and made him kneel down on a busy highway to arrest him.
article.body: Hello friends, this is pastor Artur Pawlowksi. If you're watching this video, it means they have successfully arrested me and I am in jail, he said, then asking for support for his legal battle ahead.
